verses.verse: And He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "It is inevitable <S%G418><s%> <S%G3361><s%> that stumbling <S%G4625><s%> blocks <S%G4625><s%> should come, <S%G2064><s%> but woe <S%G3759><s%> to him through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they come! <S%G2064><s%>

"It would be better <S%G3081><s%> for him if <S%G1487><s%> a millstone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3457><s%> were hung <S%G4029><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> his neck <S%G5137><s%> and he were thrown <S%G4496><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> that he should cause <S%G4624><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> little <S%G3398><s%> ones <S%G3398><s%> to stumble. <S%G4624><s%>
"Be on your guard! <S%G4337><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> sins, <S%G264><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him; and if <S%G1437><s%> he repents, <S%G3340><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> him.

"And if <S%G1437><s%> he sins <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you seven <S%G2034><s%> times <S%G2034><s%> a day, <S%G2250><s%> and returns <S%G1994><s%> to you seven <S%G2034><s%> times, <S%G2034><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'I repent, <S%G3340><s%>' forgive <S%G863><s%> him."
And the apostles <S%G652><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Increase <S%G4369><s%> our faith! <S%G4102><s%>"

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you had <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, <S%G2848><s%> you would say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> mulberry <S%G4807><s%> tree, <S%G4807><s%> 'Be uprooted <S%G1610><s%> and be planted <S%G5452><s%> in the sea <S%G2281><s%>'; and it would obey <S%G5219><s%> you.

" But which <S%G5101><s%> of you, having <S%G2192><s%> a slave <S%G1401><s%> plowing <S%G722><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> tending <S%G4165><s%> sheep, <S%G4165><s%> will say <S%G3004><s%> to him when he has come <S%G1525><s%> in from the field, <S%G68><s%> 'Come <S%G3928><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> and sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> to eat'?

"But will he not say <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Prepare <S%G2090><s%> something <S%G5101><s%> for me to eat, <S%G1172><s%> and [properly] clothe <S%G4024><s%> yourself and serve <S%G1247><s%> me until <S%G2193><s%> I have eaten <S%G2068><s%> and drunk; <S%G4095><s%> and afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3778><s%> you will eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%>'?
"He does not thank <S%G5485><s%> the slave <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> the things which were commanded, <S%G1299><s%> does he?

"So <S%G3779><s%> you too, <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the things <S%G3956><s%> which are commanded <S%G1299><s%> you, say, <S%G3004><s%> 'We are unworthy <S%G888><s%> slaves; <S%G1401><s%> we have done <S%G4160><s%> [only] that which <S%G3739><s%> we ought <S%G3784><s%> to have done. <S%G4160><s%>'"

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about while <S%G1722><s%> He was on the way <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> that He was passing <S%G1330><s%> between <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3319><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> and Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And as He entered <S%G1525><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village, <S%G2968><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> leprous <S%G3015><s%> men <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> at a distance <S%G4207><s%> met <S%G528><s%> Him;
and they raised <S%G142><s%> their voices, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us!"

And when He saw <S%G3708><s%> them, He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> and show <S%G1925><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to the priests. <S%G2409><s%>" And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that as they were going, <S%G5217><s%> they were cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, when he saw <S%G3708><s%> that he had been healed, <S%G2390><s%> turned <S%G5290><s%> back, <S%G5290><s%> glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%>
and he fell <S%G4098><s%> on his face <S%G4383><s%> at His feet, <S%G4228><s%> giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to Him. And he was a Samaritan. <S%G4541><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Were there not ten <S%G1176><s%> cleansed <S%G2511><s%>? But the nine <S%G1767><s%> â€“ where <S%G4226><s%> are they?

"Was no <S%G3756><s%> one found <S%G2147><s%> who turned <S%G5290><s%> back <S%G5290><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> foreigner <S%G241><s%>?"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Rise, <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> your way; <S%G4198><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you well. <S%G4982><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> having been questioned <S%G1905><s%> by the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> as to when <S%G4219><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> He answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not coming <S%G2064><s%> with signs <S%G3907><s%> to be observed <S%G3907><s%> ;

nor <S%G3761><s%> will they say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Look, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> [it is!]' or, <S%G2228><s%> 'There <S%G1563><s%> [it is!]' For behold, <S%G2400><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is in your midst. <S%G1787><s%> "

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "The days <S%G2250><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you will long <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%> and you will not see <S%G3708><s%> it.

"And they will say <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Look <S%G2400><s%> there! <S%G1563><s%> Look <S%G2400><s%> here! <S%G5602><s%>' Do not go <S%G565><s%> away, <S%G565><s%> and do not run <S%G1377><s%> after <S%G1377><s%> [them.]

"For just <S%G5618><s%> as the lightning, <S%G796><s%> when it flashes <S%G797><s%> out of one part of the sky, <S%G3772><s%> shines <S%G2989><s%> to the other part of the sky, <S%G3772><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> will the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be in His day. <S%G2250><s%>
"But first <S%G4413><s%> He must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> and be rejected <S%G593><s%> by this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

"And just <S%G2531><s%> as it happened <S%G1096><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it shall be also <S%G2532><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man: <S%G444><s%>

they were eating, <S%G2068><s%> they were drinking, <S%G4095><s%> they were marrying, <S%G1060><s%> they were being given <S%G7031><s%> in marriage, <S%G7031><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that Noah <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> the ark, <S%G2787><s%> and the flood <S%G2627><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G3956><s%>

"It was the same <S%G3668><s%> as happened <S%G1096><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Lot: <S%G3091><s%> they were eating, <S%G2068><s%> they were drinking, <S%G4095><s%> they were buying, <S%G59><s%> they were selling, <S%G4453><s%> they were planting, <S%G5452><s%> they were building; <S%G3618><s%>

but on the day <S%G2250><s%> that Lot <S%G3091><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out from Sodom <S%G4670><s%> it rained <S%G1026><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone <S%G2303><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G3956><s%>
"It will be just <S%G2596><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> on the day <S%G2250><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is revealed. <S%G601><s%>

"On that day, <S%G2250><s%> let not the one who <S%G3739><s%> is on the housetop <S%G1430><s%> and whose <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G4632><s%> are in the house <S%G3614><s%> go <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> them away; <S%G142><s%> and likewise <S%G3668><s%> let not the one who <S%G3588><s%> is in the field <S%G68><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> back. <S%G3694><s%> <S%G1994><s%>
"Remember <S%G3421><s%> Lot's wife. <S%G1135><s%>

"Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to keep <S%G4046><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it, and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> [his life] shall preserve <S%G2225><s%> it.

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, on that night <S%G3571><s%> there will be two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G1417><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> bed; <S%G2825><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>
"There will be two <S%G1417><s%> women grinding <S%G229><s%> at the same <S%G846><s%> place; one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>
["Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G1417><s%> will be in the field; <S%G68><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>"]

And answering <S%G611><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Where, <S%G4226><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>?" And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Where <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> [is,] there <S%G1563><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> will the vultures <S%G105><s%> be gathered. <S%G1996><s%>"
